content: 这里以VS2017 Release版本为示例:
title: STL库学习

content: String(大小0x18) struct string { Union _Bxty { char _Buf[16]; char* _Ptr; } size_t _Mysize; //字符串长度 size_t _Myres; //最大字符串长度 };
title: STL库学习

content: Vector(大小0xC) struct vector { T* _Myfirst; //数组起始地址 T* _Mylast; T* _Myend; };
title: STL库学习

content: Map(大小0x8) struct map { Tree_nod* _MyHead; unsigned int _Mysize; };
title: STL库学习

content: Tree_nod(大小0x10 + 键值对) struct __declspec(align(4)) Tree_nod { Tree_nod* _Left; Tree_nod* _Parent; Tree_nod* _Right; char _Color; char _Isnil; map_pair _Myval; //键值对 };
title: STL库学习

content: List(大小0x8) struct list { List_node* _MyHead; unsigned int _Mysize; }
title: STL库学习

content: List_node(大小0x8 + 值): struct __declspec(align(4)) List_node { List_node* _Next; List_node* _Prev; int _Myval; //值 } list->MyHead->Next为list.front(); list->MyHead->Prev为list.back();
title: STL库学习
